nio/Filter.description: A block for filtering signal objects based on a list of plaintext conditions, evaluated as Python code.

conditions.title: Filter Conditions
conditions.description: A list of strings to be evaluated as filter conditions.

operator.title: Condition Operator
operator.description: Determines whether all or any of the conditions must be satisfied for a signal to pass the filter.

false.description: Signals that evaluate to False emit from this output

true.description: Signals that evaluate to True emit from this output
